entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0045 introduce unnecessary casts #58898
  • IDE0045 loose comment before `else` #58897
  • Region position bug for #if & #elif #58895
  • Quick Actions refactoring offers to introduce parameter for variable that is already a parameter #58893

PullRequests

Created

  • Formatter3 #58904
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Fix 'remove unnecessary paren' case where we weren't removing around a suppressed expression #58903
    Area-IDE
  • Fix case where we were not removing a removable cast. #58901
    Area-IDE
  • Introduce helper extensions to make it easier to check LangVersions. #58896
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58894
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Cherry-Pick 58869 #58892
    Area-IDE
  • Add Stack Trace Explorer to our searchable options #58869
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Formatting options refactoring - step 2 #58891
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • [draft] VS 2022 new dark theme editor colors #58855
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Clone source from mirror for DartLab integration tests #58872
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable CA2009: Do not call ToImmutableCollection on an ImmutableCollection value #53141
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow native integer operators in the corresponding underlying types #53417
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix ParseVBErrorOrWarning #47833
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Extend TypeDeclarationStructureTests with records #48161
    Area-IDE, Community
  • don't include implicit/explicit keywords when completing explicit interface operator #53938
    Area-IDE, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Report AdditionalLocations for CS8618 (uninitialized non-nullable member) #58096
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update API suggestion template #58098
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Use interpolated string handler for Contract.ThrowIf methods #58173
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enable CA1822 in Visual Studio layer #50569
    Area-IDE, Blocked, Community, Needs UX Triage
  • [semi-auto-props]: Refactor and rename 'AccessingAutoPropertyFromConstructor' #58832
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add a helper diagnostic for enforcing IDE0005 (remove unnecessary usi… #58835
    Area-IDE, 17.2
  • Restore feature to tell people when a lambda is unnecessary. #58875
    Area-IDE, Feature Request
  • Support multi-caret when inserting doc comments #54741
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE
